text: Render an image of a frog donning swimming goggles. The frog is placed in a human-like environment, specifically he is preparing to take a dip in a swimming pool. The day is bright and sunny, there are also a few rubber ducks floating around him. The frog looks ready, the water reflecting off the goggles. Nearby, there's a folded towel and a tube of sunscreen, embracing the human facets of the scenario.
